hub.name: Asteria Central Station
hub.description: Primary command station. Drones are dispatched and recalled here.

lyra_trade_hub.name: Lyra Trade Hub
lyra_trade_hub.description: Commerce-heavy station with high traffic and constant resupply.

helios_relay.name: Helios Relay
helios_relay.description: Long-range comms array and navigation relay.

vega_shipyard.name: Vega Shipyard
vega_shipyard.description: Industrial shipyard with full repair facilities.

asteroid_belt_a.name: Kessler Belt — Sector A
asteroid_belt_a.description: Dense iron and nickel asteroid field. High yield, moderate danger.

asteroid_field_delta.name: Delta Drifts
asteroid_field_delta.description: Small, nearby rock field with light mineral pockets.

asteroid_field_echo.name: Echo Scatter
asteroid_field_echo.description: Loose asteroid scatter close to the hub. Quick runs, low yield.

asteroid_field_alpha_close.name: Alpha Close Drifts
asteroid_field_alpha_close.description: Near-hub training field with light ore pockets and minimal travel time.

asteroid_field_beta_close.name: Beta Fringe Cluster
asteroid_field_beta_close.description: Compact asteroid cluster at the station perimeter for quick scout sorties.

asteroid_belt_b.name: Kessler Belt — Sector B
asteroid_belt_b.description: Sparse field with rare silicate deposits. Low danger.

deep_void_outpost.name: Deep Void Outpost
deep_void_outpost.description: A remote trading post. Better prices, worse conditions.
